mapper.select: select nt.id, ct.company_name, nt.notice_title from notice_tb nt inner join company_tb ct on nt.company_id = ct.id

select nt.notice_title, nt.notice_career, nt.notice_pay, nt.notice_employtype, nt.notice_grade, nt.notice_location, nt.notice_content from company_tb tr inner join notice_tb nt on tr.id = nt.company_id where nt.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into notice_tb (company_id, notice_title, notice_employtype, notice_content, notice_location, notice_career, notice_grade, notice_pay, created_at) values(#{companyId}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeEmploytype}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticeLocation}, #{noticeCareer}, #{noticeGrade}, #{noticePay}, now())
mapper.update: update notice_tb set notice_title= #{noticeTitle}, notice_employtype= #{noticeEmploytype}, notice_content= #{noticeContent}, notice_location= #{noticeLocation}, notice_career= #{noticeCareer}, notice_grade= #{noticeGrade}, notice_pay= #{noticePay} where id = #{id}
